mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sf_order_express( b2b_order_id, waybill_no, task_code, time, service_type, pickup_zone, pickup_contact, pickup_phone, pickup_address, receive_contact, receive_phone, receive_province, receive_city, receive_county, receive_address, create_by, create_date, quarter ) VALUES ( #{b2bOrderId}, #{waybillNo}, #{taskCode}, #{time}, #{serviceType}, #{pickupZone}, #{pickupContact}, #{pickupPhone}, #{pickupAddress}, #{receiveContact}, #{receivePhone}, #{receiveProvince}, #{receiveCity}, #{receiveCounty}, #{receiveAddress}, #{createById}, #{createDt}, #{quarter} )
